edu.dynamic.dynamiz.parser

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.dynamic.dynamiz.parser.Util

  • public final class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    Util class to store some utilities function in String, Date and Number manipulation Modelled after org.apache.commons.cli

      • isValidNumberRange

        public static boolean isValidNumberRange(java.lang.String range)
        Check if a given string contains a valid positive integer number range A valid positive integer number range consists of NUMBER_FROM - NUMBER_TO where NUMBER_FROM <= NUMBER_TO
        Parameters:
        range - the string to check the number range format from
        Returns:
        true if the given string satisfies the number range format. False otherwise.

      • getNumberListFromRange

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getNumberListFromRange(java.lang.String range)
        Retrieve a List of a given string containing a valid positive integer number range
        Parameters:
        range - the string to get the number list from
        Returns:
        a List of the number from the range inclusively. Empty if the string matches format but not valid. Null otherwise.

      • addEscapeCapacityToRegex

        public static java.lang.String addEscapeCapacityToRegex(java.lang.String inputRegex)
        This will encode the given Regex string the capacity to ignore the escaped word, i.e. word preceded by the ESCAPE_CHARACTER.
        Parameters:
        inputRegex - the Regex string to be added the capacity
        Returns:
        the new Regex that include the capacity to ignore the escaped word.

      • convertStringToMyDate

        public static MyDate convertStringToMyDate(java.lang.String dateStr)
        A simple dispatcher to convert a date string representation into respective MyDate object If the string matches MyDateTime.REGEX_DATETIME then a MyDateTime object will be returned. If the string matches MyDate.REGEX_DATE then a MyDate object will be returned. A null object will be returned of neither of the above matches.
        Parameters:
        dateStr - a string representation of the date
        Returns:
        corresponding MyDate object if applicable. Otherwise return null

      • convertJodaToMyDate

        public static MyDate convertJodaToMyDate(org.joda.time.DateTime dt)
        A caster to cast from DateTime object to MyDate object. MyDate will only contain the Date information without the timing.
        Parameters:
        dt - the DateTime object to be casted
        Returns:
        the casted MyDate object

      • convertJodaToMyDateTime

        public static MyDateTime convertJodaToMyDateTime(org.joda.time.DateTime dt)
        A caster to cast from DateTime object to MyDateTime object. MyDateTime will contain the Date and Time information
        Parameters:
        dt - the DateTime object to be casted
        Returns:
        the casted MyDateTime object
